Package net.objectzoo.ebc.builder

Class SendsSignalConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.objectzoo.ebc.builder.SendsSignalConnector
  • public class SendsSignalConnector
extends java.lang.Object
    Instances of this class allow the DSL like definition of EBC flows by attaching the next EBC to a flow that ended with a SendsSignal or Event0.
    Author:
    tilmann
